articles.title: 220-Foot NF 2024 Asteroid Racing Towards Earth, NASA Alerts - NDTV
articles.description: NASA also tracks other near-Earth asteroids and is developing the DART mission to test asteroid deflection technologies.
articles.content:
Classified within the Apollo group, this asteroid is not considered hazardous.
